text: Cheng Rongshi (; 18 October 1927 â€“ 7 February 2021) was a Chinese physical chemist and academician. He was a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, being elected in 1991. Cheng was born in Yixing, Jiangsu. On 7 February 2021, he died of illness in Guangzhou, Guangdong, aged 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese chemists Category:Scientists from Jiangsu Category:20th-century Chinese scientists
title: Cheng Rongshi
